executive_summary.overview: A simple Hello World application designed to demonstrate basic application functionality and serve as a foundation for future development. This application will display a "Hello World" message and provide a clean, user-friendly interface.

objectives.objective: Create a minimal viable application that displays "Hello World"
Establish a foundation for future feature development
Demonstrate best practices in application development
Provide a reference implementation for new developers

weaknesses.weakness: Heavy and complex for simple applications

competitor.name: Next.js Starter
competitor.description: Vercel's React framework with built-in optimizations

strengths.strength: Server-side rendering out of the box

weaknesses.weakness: May be overkill for simple apps

competitor.name: Create React App
competitor.description: Official React starter with zero configuration

weaknesses.weakness: Large bundle size for simple apps

market_analysis.market_opportunity: The Hello World application serves as an entry point for developers new to web development or a specific framework. There is consistent demand for simple, well-documented starter applications that demonstrate core concepts without overwhelming complexity.

requirement.title: Display Hello World Message
requirement.description: The application must display "Hello World" text prominently on the main page

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Text "Hello World" is visible on page load
Text is centered on the page
Text is readable with appropriate font size

requirement.title: Responsive Design
requirement.description: The application should display correctly on various screen sizes

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Application renders correctly on mobile devices
Application renders correctly on desktop screens

requirement.title: Interactive Element
requirement.description: Include a button that changes the greeting when clicked

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Button is clearly visible and labeled
Animation or transition provides visual feedback

requirement.title: Performance
requirement.description: Page load time should be under 2 seconds

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Initial page load completes in under 2 seconds on 3G connection
Time to interactive is under 1 second

requirement.title: Accessibility
requirement.description: Application should be accessible to users with disabilities

frontend.framework: To be determined based on team expertise

development_standards.testing: Unit tests for any interactive functionality

story.title: As a visitor, I want to see "Hello World" when I load the page
story.description: When I navigate to the application URL, I should immediately see a "Hello World" message displayed prominently

story.title: As a mobile user, I want the app to display correctly on my device
story.description: The Hello World message and any interactive elements should be appropriately sized for mobile screens

story.title: As a user, I want to interact with the application
story.description: I should be able to click a button that changes the greeting message

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Message changes are smooth and noticeable

metric.name: User Engagement
metric.target: 50% of visitors interact with button (if implemented)

risk.description: Scope creep - Adding unnecessary features to a simple Hello World app
risk.mitigation: Strict adherence to PRD requirements and regular stakeholder check-ins

risk.description: Over-engineering - Using complex solutions for simple requirements
risk.mitigation: Code reviews focused on simplicity and maintainability

risk.description: Technology stack disagreement among team members
risk.mitigation: Team voting or technical lead decision with documented rationale

linear_epic.title: Hello World Application Development
linear_epic.description:
Build a simple Hello World application that demonstrates basic web development practices and serves as a foundation for future development.
Key Objectives: - Display "Hello World" message prominently - Implement responsive design for all devices - Add interactive element to enhance user engagement - Ensure accessibility and performance standards - Set up automated deployment pipeline
Success Criteria: - Page loads in under 2 seconds - WCAG 2.1 AA compliance - Works on all modern browsers - Clean, maintainable codebase

references.reference: MDN Web Docs - Getting Started with the Web
